properties.name: localist.api.base-url
properties.description: Base URL for the Localist calendar instance.

properties.name: localist.api.access-token
properties.description: Optional access token for authenticated requests.

properties.name: localist.api.default-page-size
properties.description: Default number of items per page for paginated responses.

properties.name: localist.api.max-page-size
properties.description: Maximum allowed number of items per page.
